mapper.insert: insert plant_cert (producing_area, processing_area, plant_name, variety, car_amount, every_car_amount, packaging, standard, receive_person, receive_address_type, receive_address, phone, person_id, date_time, apply_person, transport_person, report_number, car_number, cid) select #{plantCert.producing_area}, #{plantCert.processing_area}, #{plantCert.plant_name}, #{plantCert.variety}, #{plantCert.car_amount}, #{plantCert.every_car_amount}, #{plantCert.packaging}, #{plantCert.standard}, #{plantCert.receive_person}, #{plantCert.receive_address_type}, #{plantCert.receive_address}, #{plantCert.phone}, #{plantCert.person_id}, #{plantCert.date_time}, #{plantCert.apply_person}, #{plantCert.transport_person}, #{plantCert.report_number}, #{plantCert.car_number}, cid from company_user_c where uid = #{userId};
mapper.select: select coalesce(sum(amount), 0) from (select sum(amount) as amount from board_cert where cid = (select cid from company_user_c where uid = #{uid}) and status = 2 group by cid) as a;
select coalesce(sum(amount), 0) from (select sum(amount) as amount from wood_cert where cid = (select cid from company_user_c where uid = #{uid}) and status = 2 group by cid) as a;

select * from board_cert where cid = (select cid from company_user_c where uid = #{uid})
and status = #{status}

select * from wood_cert where cid = (select cid from company_user_c where uid = #{uid})
and status = #{status}
